players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Bob: "This is a sad start. Diana, since you're a villager, we should hear from Alice too. Let's all share our thoughts carefully."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out immediately."
Bob: "Alice, that's a desperate lie. I investigated Diana last night and she's the mafioso. You're trying to frame me to protect your partner!"
You: "Bob is lying. As the detective, I confirmed he is mafia. He has no investigation ability to use on Diana. Vote Bob now."

Diana: "Alice claims to be the detective and says she investigated Bob. Bob claims to be the detective and says he investigated me. We have two conflicting claims of being the detective. One of them is lying. Given that Charlie is dead, and we're down to three players..."
